name: Lightning
storyline:
In the near future, the infamous and oldest giant corp has attained advanced technology capabilities,
One of their exceptional tech out of all is bringing thousands-year-old beings to life using nothing but their DNA that's been harvested throughout the planet. this time in search of any powerful ancient myths that are known today. legends and myths that might once walked the earth.

This technology however new, they have been succeeding in finding these myths and merging the DNAs with a modern human. resulting in the subjects attaining partial powers and appearance of the original owner of the DNA.

Rumors are, they have been harnessing some kind of alien tech that might happen to be from a classified asteroid crash site.
A group of unknowns is said to be on the rise to stop this from going any further, but they're yet to reveal themselves.
summary: Fast-paced competitive FPS with character abilities. combining realistic settings with superpowers. geared toward esport.
